Highlighted Clause: You and verizon media agree that there will not be a jury trial.
Plain Language Summary: Users and Verizon Media both give up the right to have a trial by jury for any disputes related to the services.

Highlighted Clause: The service provider can change, temporarily disable, or permanently cancel your ability to use their services at any time for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: Verizon Media may change or end your service at their discretion, without needing to notify you beforehand.

Highlighted Clause: If the fee-based service includes a third-party product, your purchase and use of the service is also subject to the third partyâ€™s terms of service and privacy policy.
Plain Language Summary: If you use a service that includes third-party products, you are also agreeing to that third party's terms and privacy policies.

Highlighted Clause: After 30 days from the date of any unpaid charges, your fee-based service will be deemed delinquent and we may terminate or suspend your account and fee-based service for nonpayment.
Plain Language Summary: If you don't pay for a service for 30 days, Verizon Media may deactivate your service or close your account.

Highlighted Clause: This license is for the sole purpose of enabling you to use and enjoy the benefit of the services we provide, in the manner permitted by these terms and any additional terms or guidelines.
Plain Language Summary: Verizon Media grants you a license to use their services according to the rules they set.

Highlighted Clause: Your subscription will be automatically renewed at the then-current price, excluding promotional and discount pricing.
Plain Language Summary: Your subscription will renew automatically and you'll be charged the current rate unless it's a promotional or discounted price.

Highlighted Clause: We may freely assign these terms and all of the policies and other documents incorporated or referenced in it, for any reason, including for the purpose of internal restructuring.
Plain Language Summary: Verizon Media can transfer this agreement to anyone at any time, such as in a merger or acquisition.

Highlighted Clause: You may cancel and delete your AOL or Yahoo account at any time.
Plain Language Summary: You have the right to close and remove your AOL or Yahoo account whenever you choose.

Highlighted Clause: We reserve the right to discontinue any Verizon Media RSS feed at any time and to require anyone to cease use of a Verizon Media RSS feed at any time for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: Verizon Media can stop or tell someone to stop using their RSS feeds without any notice, at any time.

Highlighted Clause: The services are provided by the company that offers the services in your region as set out in section 14.2.
Plain Language Summary: The specific Verizon Media company providing your service depends on where you live.
